comments.body: shouldn't this be a feature of AppBar (or one of its related classes)?

I'm not sure, but I'm leaning towards not a feature. Using a gradient here makes sense because our image needs it. If the background was a solid color that contrasted nicely with the white toolbar icons, then the gradient would be out of place. It's easy for the developer to add a gradient and I think that deciding if its needed should be their responsibility.

We could add a flag to FlexibleSpaceBar that did this for you, but maybe its better to shy away from that kind of thing. I am leery of handy-dandy :-).
